version_description: Fixed bug: custom ringtones expired in some cases.
We periodically update HourlyMeow, which includes performance optimization and stability improvements.
We periodically update HourlyMeow, which includes performance optimization and stability improvements.

•New interface.
•More concise and efficient operation experience.
•You can create individual hourly or half-hourly chime scenarios now.
•Added text message notification.
•New countdown timer function.
•Freely modulate colors of themes.
•Added classic electronic watch ringtones and more meows.
•Added time points voices.
• Fixed time zone changes issue (Important: After the first update, please turn off all your hourly chime scenarios and open them again to synchronize the time zone)
I found that I still had shortcomings and had to correct it...
Fix 14:30 Chinese voice error, you guys can re-switch to make the fix take effect.
